input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item specifications and item name.

Item name:
Pleaser Women's Bliss-33 Platform Pump

Item specifications:
100% Synthetic
Synthetic sole
Heel measures approximately 4 1/4"
Platform measures approximately 3/4"
D'Orsay Style
3/4" platform
4-1/4" stiletto heel
Adjustable and upper ankle strap
Leopard Pony Hair on the outer. Shoes run approximately 1/2 size small.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Bliss is a sexy and fierce pump. The upper is made of a leopard print pony hair material with a 4 1/4" stiletto heel. There is a 3/4" platform, adjustable ankle strap, and an upper ankle strap. The Bliss is a shoe that will have you feeling fierce all night long.
input_text.Response B: Pleaser Women's Bliss-33 Platform Pump are a great way to show off your fashion style. These shoes feature a leopard pony hair on the outer, with a 3/4" platform and a 4-1/4" stiletto heel. The shoes are a D'Orsay Style with an adjustable and upper ankle strap. The synthetic sole and 100% synthetic materials used to make these shoes provide comfort and durability, so you can wear them for hours without any discomfort or shoe damage. These shoes run approximately 1/2 size small, so it is recommended that you order a size up.

label_annotations.factors_a: Response A did not provide enough detail.
label_annotations.factors_b: Response B Got a Full detailed answer and Clarity.
